lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Hello, nice to meet you. I am Beige, Larry Beige.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Oh are you…

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: The local police officer? Yes indeed, in the flesh. You heard about me?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Yes, I have heard you are very dedicated to protecting this town, you have caught many criminals. It is pleasure to meet you, what does this small Kiosk owe your visit?

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Thank you for the nice words, clerk, I just want to get quick things before I return to work.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Ah makes sense, we don't have the biggest variety, it is hard to stock when the big companies get all the goods at good prices, we are left with scraps and recently profits are running low…

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: I understand, I hope your owner is not too stressed but the shop is nice, it has a good variety

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: He has his moments but thank you, what would you like to get?

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Could I get a pack of hotshots, please.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: I got you, gimme a second ...

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: You sure buddy?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Yeah of course, no problem. No need for ID

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Ok interesting choice…

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: I give the customer what they really want without making them wait.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: There you go

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Thanks buddy

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Also you mind if I smoke one here real quick?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: I am sorry you have to go away, there are other customers here

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: What but there is no one, It is going to be real quick

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Nope, after work we can chat, but I suspect you want to ask me questions about the shady guy

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Shady who? How do you know about this figure?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Ohh…No one, my bad. I am sorry, I just have heard stories…

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: I wanted to just sit and chat for a bit, but now I have more questions. If I get the case, I will be back for more questions. Well done clerk, now you are on my radar…

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Good luck, kid

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Yeah sure, go ahead

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Thank you, there has been so much work recently, I haven't had the opportunity to relax even for a bit.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: What are you working on now so much?

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Catching criminals! HA, but not really. There have been mostly cyber crimes nowadays, I am still preparing my documents.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Oh, you cannot investigate these kinds of crimes?

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Legally no I need to have special clearance for it. And I need to get the official course on SSI to be considered eligible, to question people on the rules. Now clerk, I have a question why didn't you check my ID and follow the SSI procedure. You know this is not legally correct?

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Ah can we skip this part, I hate the process. I don't look old enough for you?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Yeah makes sense actually SSI is not that important

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: No it is not that, but there are rules and I have to enforce them, otherwise if I let you go I might let others go without ID as well, you know how it goes

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Haha…sorry I was testing you, an old habit of mine, here is the ID

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Good thing I pay attention to SSI then, ok all good now!

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: There you go

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Also you mind if I smoke one here, real quick?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Yeah sure, go ahead

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Thank you, there has been so much work recently, I haven't had the opportunity to relax even for a bit.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: What are you working on now so much?

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Catching criminals! HA, but not really. There have been mostly cyber crimes recently, I am still preparing my documents. Legally no I need to have special clearance for it. And I need to get the official course on SSI to be considered eligible

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: I see so you have been selected for the job but still there is a lot of paper work

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Exactly! Government stuff, you probably know how it is…

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: That all is nice but what is your end goal? Become a detective?

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Woah, that is a good question. Honestly I am not sure myself. I have been looking forward for this promotion and focusing on it, I forgot what was my goal with it. I want to protect the people of this town and to provide for my family

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: It is great that you have those things in this economy! How old are you if it is not confidential

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Of course not , I will share with you. I am 31. But I will have to get back to work

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: It was nice chatting with you! A tip? Thanks Larry!

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Nice chatting with you Larry but I will have to get back to work, sorry… Don’t get me wrong though, I am looking forward to chat with you again soon!

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Totally understandable, I don't want to take from your time. Likewise, clerk. Take care, will see you soon!

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Can I check your ID?

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Haha…sorry I was testing you, an old habit of mine, here is the ID

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Good thing I pay attention to SSI then

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: All good now! Can I get your basic info?

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: There you go.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Nice, here are your HotShot ciggies!

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Also you mind if I smoke one here real quick?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: I am really sorry I don't know how it has slipped from my mind

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: It didn't slip you actively decided to not check it. Don't try to cover it

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Yes, again I am sorry. It won't happen again.

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Clerk, this time I close my eyes but be careful, next time I wont be so forgiving. You are lucky today I am in my good mood. Will see you again. By then take care, and be more careful…

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Yes sir, I normally check everything by the book, today I slipped, only today

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Time will show, I will keep an eye on you…

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Will see you again. By then take care, and be more careful...

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Yes sir, good luck on your promotion!

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: You take care too...

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Sorry, I don't know how it slipped, can I have some of your information.

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: And why is that?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: I messed up but I want to do it by the book, I am sorry for the inconvenience

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Sure if this is the legal way I consent.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Thank you and...here we are done

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: Can I have my card again, clerk?

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Yes of course, thank you again, I like to do things by the book

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: I see that as well clerk, definitely. I will have to go back to work, need to fill in a report I remembered as well. Very forgetful, just like you

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: HA, well take care Larry!

lines.speaker: Larry Beige
lines.text: You too clerk, please call me Beige or mr Beige.

lines.speaker: Clerk
lines.text: Oh ok…mr Beige
